text:
@GavinNewsom U allow Covid 19 positive cases 2 GO BACK TO the nursing homes??!! What is the matter with you!?!?  do you not have any seniors in your life?  This is how you choose to respect our elders?  #Covid19
https://t.co/MZc6M6W6BE
